title: How to make your jungler gank with 5 easy words
body:
/all " We don't have a jg"

Trust me it works 0% of the time

replies.body: "Top pushing, no wards, free"

tested it, doesn't work.

Jungler prefers to dive bot and die.
{{champion:266}} Ya.... That's kinda how it works. Be nice if you'd help me get out after I die though. (>_>)
Are you quoting your team or their team? Because this is exactly what my team mate does. Push top, doesn't ward get ganked. Oops.

If I'm playing top-lane, that's typically how I get my jungler to gank for me.

Play a champion with CC, track the enemy's warding times/locations and let your jungler know when the lane is pushing into you.

A control ward along the gank path is an added bonus.

I usually like to play pushers TOP so i play passive and farm like a little after my own tower range. When I see the enemy jungler is bot i push like a mofo and go buck wild on their asses if i can. If im countered I TP bot and hope for the best :P

to be fair as a Jungler what I'm seeing is "I fed and my opponent will kill us both."

Not nessecarily accurate, but with the always puch potatoes I play with all the time I need to be really cautios when they aren't.

It can depend on who you play with.

I'm high enough that people generally know how to manage the minion wave and prepare for ganks.

Rather than "I'm being shoved in, send help", it is closer to "even minion wave on their side of the map, they can't stop it from pushing to me".
My top always pushing with no wards and they are a free gank to the ennemy jungler you are right.
Works 100% of the time for the enemy jungler though.

> [{quoted}](name=Sraeg2013,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=NPvtRLHs,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2017-06-25T20:24:41.268+0000)
>
> Works 100% of the time for the enemy jungler though.

Can confirm, salt is a good flavor for ganks

Honestly though, why would you EVER tell in all chat your jungler is bad or AFK?

I remember the last time that happened to the enemy team(an AFK) and we haven't learned about it until I though with "this is weird" and warded the enemy red(was closer), because it was level 5 and nobody seen their jungler.
The buff was taken before I warded and about 15 seconds later the jungler ganked the closes lane except he was level 2 or 3.

I swear if my team had an AFK jungler it wouldn't take a minute before one of those idiots would cry in /all chat how miserable "this ELO" is.
As a jungle main, I couldn't agree more.

{{champion:33}} Ok

*rolls it down mid*
I like the use of the word "roll" instead of "run".

\- We don't have a jungle
\- Stop flaming him
\- No really, he afk'd

\- We don't have a jungle
\- Stop flaming him
\- No really, yours took all his monsters
Well, the absense of monsters doesn't mean the jungle has gone.
the presence of a hungry enemy jungler usually does though, going in there is asking to get eaten.

I don't believe in the existence of "junglers". Occasionally like an old fishermans' tale of a mermaid I'll encounter what looks like a jungler ganking for me, but they leave so fast I question whether they were real or not.

{{champion:267}} Junglers exist. They hail from the fabled top lane.
I've seen them!

/all report jungle afk 
"next gank should be easy"
but it might not be the gank you wanted
but it's the one you deserve

I can't win my lane so I'm upset someone else isn't helping me win it! Report jungle useless trash won't gank 4/0 riven and he's only gables mid and bot (0/2)

Majority of league players logic in a nutshell.
A personal favorite of mine is when they compare the jungler even though one is lee sin level 3 and the other is master yi level 3.

I don't know man, the usual words don't work.

"He has no flash/tp"

"He's out of mana, come"

"Stop taking your krugs he's afk under my tower"
That last one.... pure gold.
Don't insult the Junglers, they're in higher concentrations due to the recent rengarmains invasion
"Report my  jungler ,never gank". You're sure a jungler will Côme,though not the  one you expected
{{champion:122}} {{champion:420}} "Who the hell needs a gank when you can kill the opponent laner AND their jungler?"
{{champion:75}}  (plus 250-500 stacks)
{{champion:82}} Who the hell needs a jungler when you can just force the enemy jungler to take the turret
how to make your jungler gank with 4 easy words: ill suck you off.

Better 5 words
"He got only  five kills."
signed in just to upvote {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

report this guy dor revealing the secrets of the hermetic order of gamers

dejum Crowley, dejum
"it's a yasuo player"

Honestly, shit like this is tilting, just ping for assistance. I  get very tilted when my teammates say stuff like this and  "Warwick: 3 Zac: 0" Like come on.

I just realized that you said 0%, funny meme, but just saying this in all seriousness

Junglers aren't supposed to help you win lane!! But the reason the enemy team is winning is because their jungler helped them win lane, then take turret and drag....
It seems that junglers are they key cog in matches, in most cases, the side with the worse jungler is way more likely to lose.
i just ended one game with our {{champion:77}} running 1/3 early then afk at the middle of the game, we won because of magic :v
You mean the match vs the bronze players?...in NORMS....with the vlad with NO keystone....

Or that will be selffuffiling as the jungled gets fed up and intentionally tanks only the other lanes. Or just quits. I have some better 5-word strats.

-Can you please gank me?
-Opponent is pushing to tower.
-Opponent no summs easy gank.

And many, many more!

I always freeze lanes. This hurts when i constantly have to collapse and save my jungler from invades.

I gave up hope. I inform people of cds, summoner used and expect nothing.

The jungle circle #### gets old. Every laner isn't great and every jungle isn't peanut

You will have bad teammates, get over it.

Every time a lane says that, they are generally already feeding 1v1. Meaning I'll never show up to their lane. Just toggle a quick mute, and go about my business. I make it a point to track the enemy jungler, and am always around to counter gank if there is no counter jungling to be done, or lanes where we can gain any traction. Whiners don't really make my radar. They are usually weak and not worth putting ahead anyway.
Works 100% of time, 0% of the time.

How to make you jungle gank 100% of the time: {{champion:16}} 

Even works top!
"Come gank me mid, i have cookies."
0% of the time it works every time
